column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: entity. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ent: <http://www.example.org/ontology/entity#> .ent:Entity rdf:type owl:Class .ent:hasIdentifier rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ent:Entity ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has identifier"@en .ent:hasType rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ent:Entity ;    rdfs:range xsd:string ;    rdfs:label "has type"@en .ent:hasProperty rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ent:Entity ;    rdfs:range owl:Thing ;    rdfs:label "has property"@en .ent:linkedEntity rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;    rdfs:domain ent:Entity ;    rdfs:range ent:Entity ;    rdfs:label "linked entity"@en .```
